mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, username, password, salt, email, type, status, activation_code, header_url, create_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{email}, #{type}, #{status}, #{activationCode}, #{headerUrl}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET status = #{status} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE user SET header_url = #{headerUrl} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE user SET password = #{password} WHERE id=#{id}
